meanings.sent1: The smugglers hid the illegal items in their bags.
meanings.sent2: The authorities caught the smugglers at the border.
meanings.sent3: The smugglers tried to sneak past the customs officers, but they were too slow.
meanings.sent4: The smugglers operated in the shadows, like ghosts in the night.
meanings.sent5: The image of the smugglers carrying contraband will forever be etched in my mind.

meanings.definition: To import or export secretly, in violation of the law.
meanings.sent1: The criminals smugglers goods across the border.
meanings.sent2: She decided to smugglers the valuable artifacts out of the country.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to smugglers its toy mouse under the door.
meanings.sent4: The idea of smuggling happiness into people's lives appealed to her.
meanings.sent5: The plan to smugglers the ancient treasure was risky but exciting.
